titleStmt.title: An ancient and true prophesie of all those transactions that have already happened: also what is to come: of the event of the great actions in being: what government we are to expect. In which is contained, excellent cautions to the sonnes of men. Written in verse, in the latter end of the raign of Queen Elizabeth, and found in Sir Robert Cotton's library.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Page, living in Barbican, in Three Pigeon-Court,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
